original: “Tayome, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu kammārāmo hoti, kammarato, kammārāmatamanuyutto;
analyzed: ▁idha ▁bhikkhave ▁sekh o ▁bhikkhu ▁kamm ārām o ▁hoti ▁kamma rato ▁kamm ārām at amanu yutto
▁bh ass ārām o ▁hoti ▁bh assa rato ▁bh ass ārām at amanu yutto
▁nidd ārām o ▁hoti ▁nidd ā rato ▁nidd ārām at amanu yutto

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
Tayome, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattanti.
Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na kammārāmo hoti, na kammarato, na kammārāmatamanuyutto;
analyzed: ▁idha ▁bhikkhave ▁sekh o ▁bhikkhu ▁na ▁kamm ārām o ▁hoti ▁na ▁kamma rato ▁na ▁kamm ārām at amanu yutto

original: na bhassārāmo hoti, na bhassarato, na bhassārāmatamanuyutto;
analyzed: ▁na ▁bh ass ārām o ▁hoti ▁na ▁bh assa rato ▁na ▁bh ass ārām at amanu yutto

original: na niddārāmo hoti, na niddārato, na niddārāmatamanuyutto.
analyzed: ▁na ▁nidd ārām o ▁hoti ▁na ▁nidd ā rato ▁na ▁nidd ārām at amanu yutto

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.

analyzed: ▁p hu ṭṭh uṃ ▁sam bodhi mutt am aṃ
▁p hu ṭṭh uṃ ▁sam bodhi mutt am anti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
